nodes.text: The Doan Royal Guard was the guard of the Doan Royal House. Lucia, a member of the Gloom Walkers during the New Sith Wars, became the bodyguard of Serra, and later joined the Doan Royal Guard after Serra's marriage to Prince Gerran. Captain Jedder, a senior member of the Royal Guard, was sent by Serra to assist the Iktotchi known as the Huntress to capture Darth Bane.
